imdb.plot outline: Snapped Judgment breaks through the wall of rhetoric, correctness, facts and evidence to provide a true look at what people are thinking. Our subjects will be given topics straight from the headlines and react to these stories with their humor, opinion and preconceived notions of the events. At no time will these positions be researched or check for accuracy. These are Snapped Judgments.
imdb.title: Snapped Judgment
plot: _Snapped Judgment_ (qv) breaks through the wall of rhetoric, correctness, facts and evidence to provide a true look at what people are thinking.
